alert.note: Alert for Callaway; Moniteau; Monroe (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 1:15PM CDT until July 29 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR BOONE...WESTERN AUDRAIN...SHELBY...WESTERN CALLAWAY...MONROE AND NORTHEASTERN MONITEAU COUNTIES... At 113 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cairo to near Rocheport, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This complex has a history of producing 60 to 70 mph winds along with downed trees. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Sturgeon, Midway, Hallsville, Madison, Centralia, Murry, Paris, Mexico and Auxvasse. This also includes Rock Bridge State Park, Finger Lakes State Park, Union Covered Bridge Historic Site, and Jewell Cemetery Historic Site. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 115 and 148. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
